name: Lucent (GAME JAM version)
description:
Made in less than 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Controls:
Arrow keys or joystick to move.
Ctrl key or Back button to reset the current puzzle, but only when you are in darkness (frozen).

There is a known issue related to resetting a puzzle while in ice, the game is completely playable as long as you don't do that, we will fix this in the post Jam release.

Follow our newsletter and get a free extra level for our other game, TENANT: https://croxel-studios.com/newsletter

Credits:

  • Pablo Moreno (@HypercubeCore):  Level design & VFX
  • Alberto Navarro (@forameuss): Music & SFX
  • Luis Gutiérrez (@Lwyx): Programming
